classification.task_goal: Set a maximum width for a LinearLayout in Android XML to prevent elements from looking ugly in landscape mode.
primary_constraints: LinearLayout must have a maxWidth attribute set to limit its width.
TextView elements must wrap text and expand vertically without being cut off.
classification.reasoning: The AI initially suggested using maxWidth on the LinearLayout, which did not work as expected. The user later found that setting maxWidth on the TextView elements to match the parent LinearLayout resolved the issue, indicating a repair of the constraint violation.
